title: How to play an all in comp vs a pick Comp  ( a lesson from amumu)
body:
Play amumu sit around all day and never engage fights... occasionally bitch at ur adc for taking jungle camps. Wait till enemy eve (maya fey)  picks off ur ADC.  Run away.

oh and if ur playing naut KS the akali and also sit around with amumu. 

Profit. 

Lel this is why i KNOW i don't belong in plat the kids here have no common sense when it comes to teamfighting.
